backend/main.mo: Actor storing certificate IDs in a map with methods to verify, add, and remove certificates with error trapping.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and content of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions using OKLCH variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point with SEO metadata and script mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app file configuring TanStack Router, global layout, theme provider, and route tree.
frontend/src/components/HeroCodeLines.ts: Animated decorative code-line overlay for the hero section.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with branding, quick links, legal links, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with branding, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/data/articles.ts: Defines the Article interface and exports a list of article objects with metadata and full content.
frontend/src/data/courses.ts: Defines the Course interface and provides a list of cybersecurity course definitions with descriptions and icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and state tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark cybersecurity themes and custom UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Exports simple validation functions for required fields and email format checking.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity, global styles, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, story, values, and testimonials for the organization.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full article based on the URL slug with navigation, metadata, and formatted content.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of article cards using data from articles and allows navigation to each article’s detail page.
frontend/src/pages/CertificateVerificati: Implements a certificate verification form using an actor backend and mutation state to validate certificate IDs.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation, localStorage submission, and social links.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Renders a list of course cards with details such as level, duration, and an enroll button.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows a homepage with a hero section, featured courses, and navigation buttons to courses and articles.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Displays static privacy policy sections outlining data collection, usage, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Renders a resources page displaying categorized cybersecurity tool lists with icons and a responsible‑use notice.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Defines the terms and conditions page using card sections outlining rules, user conduct, and liability.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, plugins, and container settings for the UI.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current build state, feature list, and high‑level summary for the cybersecurity site.
